keyword: how many calories is in miller lite
title: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in Miller Lite per standard serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Miller Lite light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and pouring method. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 fl oz Miller Lite contains 96 calories and 3.2 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Regular Miller (vs. Lite) per 12 fl oz
With 1 oz mixed nuts as bar snack

faqs.q: How many calories is in Miller Lite per bottle?
faqs.a: About 96 calories in a standard 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: 3.2 g carbohydrates per 12 fl oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller Lite have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Miller Lite compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to Bud Light (95 kcal) but lower than Coors Light (102 kcal) per 12 fl oz.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 fl oz serving.
